data.convo: Good morning , Mr.Jones ! Good morning , Miss Bell ! Nice to see you again . Nice to see you too . It's been a long time . How is everything ? Just fine , and you ? Quite well , thank you . Did you drive yourself to the airport ? No , I was driven by my husband . Did someone meet you at the airport here ? Yes , thanks . Is this where we'll be holding the meeting ? No , the meeting will be held on the fourth floor .
